sentence.Network_en: He questioned Chrissie, and listened attentively to what she told him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他询问了克里茜，并仔细聆听她所说的话。

sentence.Network_en: She listened attentively while I poured out my problems.
sentence.Network_cn: 我倾吐心中的烦恼时,她一直在注意听.

sentence.Network_en: She listened attentively and set down every word he said.
sentence.Network_cn: 她专心听着,把他说的话一字不漏地记下来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2013年高考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... attention n. 注意，关心 attentively ad. 注意地 attract v. 吸引，引起.
首页 - 杭州君宏文化创意有限公司 ... 爱心 LOVE 用心 ATTENTIVELY 真心 REALLY.
2013年高考英语词汇表_百度文库 ... attempt 企图,尝试； attentively 专心地； attract 吸引；.
2011年中考英语词性转换专题 - 豆丁网 ... attend v 出席参加 attentively adv 聚精会神地注意地 15. beautiful a 美丽的.

list.abs: 选择性注意（selective attention）是指在外界诸多刺激中仅仅注意到某些刺激或刺激的某些方面，而忽略了其他刺激。编辑本段作用  …
注意广度如图所示，横坐标6上的红线代表着人类平均注意广度（attention span）。我们注意到在5.5的位置上函数曲线几乎是看不见 …
在注意力经济(attention economy)的时代，面对每天数百万计的信息更新量以及数十亿计的网络页面“轰炸”着我们这个时代，我们应该 …

entry.def: If you are attentive, you are paying close attention to what is being said or done.

example.ex: The vast majority of the attentive audience applauded these sentiments...
example.tran: 大多数聚精会神听讲的观众都对这些观点表示赞赏。

example.ex: He wishes the government would be more attentive to detail in their response.
example.tran: 他希望政府的回应能更加关注细节。

entry.def: Someone who is attentive is helpful and polite.

example.ex: At society parties he is attentive to his wife...
example.tran: 在社交聚会上，他对妻子体贴周到。

example.ex: The staff is well trained in courteous and attentive service to each and every guest.
example.tran: 员工训练有素，为每一位客人提供礼貌周到的服务。

auth_sentence.content: He looked at me attentively for the first time.
auth_sentence.res_content: He looked at me attentively for the first time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He looked at me attentively for the first time.

auth_sentence.content: West attentively,throws away yoke of overpragmatism through so-called biparisan.
auth_sentence.res_content: West attentively,throws away yoke of overpragmatism through so-called biparisan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: West attentively,throws away yoke of overpragmatism through so-called biparisan.

auth_sentence.content: The empty expanses which in posters appear merely flat are attentively worked surfaces.
auth_sentence.res_content: The empty expanses which in posters appear merely flat are attentively worked surfaces.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The empty expanses which in posters appear merely flat are attentively worked surfaces.

stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ive……的→伸展出去的→注意的,有礼貌的
intention[n.意图,意向,目的]+al表形容词→adj.有意图的, 故意的
pre前+tent伸展,趋向+ious……的→提前摆出一种姿态→做作的
attentive[adj.注意的;有礼貌的]+ly表副词→adv.注意地, 留意地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 注意,注意力;立正;特别照顾;照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ion表名词→伸展出去→注意;照料

stems_affixes.value_cn: 广度,宽度,长度;程度,限度
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tent伸展,趋向→伸出去的范围→广度,宽度
intent[adj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图]+ion表名词→n.意图,意向,目的
tent伸展,趋向→伸展开用来遮雨,阳光等→帐篷

sentences.en: She listened attentively while I poured out my problems.
sentences.cn: 我倾吐心中的烦恼时,她一直在注意听。

sentences.en: She listened attentively and set down every word he said.
sentences.cn: 她专心听着,把他说的话一字不漏地记下来。

sentences.en: He was writing his report so attentively that he didn’t know the rice gruel in the pot had boiled over.
sentences.cn: 他聚精会神地写报告,连锅里的稀饭煮溢了也不知道。
